name: Art Summer Camp
description: Youth will explore each theme, learning contemporary arts methods and tools, completing individual and collaborative projects, along with movement and play. These programs are open to all rising 3rd-5th grade students. - No experience required. - All materials will be provided.
fullDescription: Youth will explore each theme, learning contemporary arts methods and tools, completing individual and collaborative projects, along with movement and play. These programs are open to all rising 3rd-5th grade students. - No experience required. - All materials will be provided.
